Detailed Description

Defines Spoint seq of a space dimension and of a size.

MGSPointSeq is designed to represent a control polygon network of B-Spline surface. MGSPointSeq has its capacity and actual length used. The dimensioning is like MGSPointSeq spoint(i,j,k). i has u direction length nu, j has v direction length nv, and k has space dimension sd. Then minimum area size is nu*nv*sd, and 0<=i<nu, 0<=j<nv, 0<=k<sd.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

size_t  sizev = 0,
size_t  dim = 0 
) [explicit]

Of m_lenght=size(for u and v dierction), Dimensioning of MGSointSeq is MGSPointSeq(i,j,k).

i:u-direction, j:v-direction, k:space dimension. space dimension

Parameters:

sizev size of v-direction

Member Function Documentation

int MGSPointSeq::average_plane ( MGPosition &  center,
MGPlane &  plane,
MGStraight &  line,
double &  deviation 
) const

compute an average plane of the point sequence.

Function's return value is: 1: Point seq is a point. 2: Point seq is on a line. 3: Plane is output.

Parameters:
center center of point seq will be output.
plane Plane will be output, when average_plane=3.
line Straight line will be output =2.
deviation Maximum deviation from point, line, or plane will be output.

Transformation of own for rational(MGRLBRep) Control Polygon.

void MGSPointSeq::make_data_point ( MGNDDArray &  utau,
MGNDDArray &  vtau 
) const

Generate data point abscissa(utau=u-direction and vtau=v-direction) from data point ordinates SPointSeq.

SPointSeq(*this) must be homogeneous, i.e. if SPointSeq is positional data, all of them must be positional data, should not include derivative data.

MGSPointSeq MGSPointSeq::non_homogeneous (  )  const

Compute non_homogeneous coordonate data without w coordinate element, assumed that this is homogeneous coordinate data, i.e., maximum space dimension element is w(weight) coordinate.

Result data does not include weight elements.

void MGSPointSeq::store_at ( size_t  i,
size_t  j,
const double *  data,
size_t  to = 0 
)

Store data[r] data to this(i,j,to+r) for 0<=r<sdim().

When (to+r) reached to maximum space dimension id, next id becomes 0(form the start).

Parameters:
j id of this which indicates the placement.
data Input data array.
to Indicates to where of this in the space dimension id.

void MGSPointSeq::store_BP_along_u_at ( size_t  j,
const MGBPointSeq &  bp,
size_t  to = 0,
size_t  from = 0 
)

Store BPointSeq along u at v's id j.

That is, data bp(i,from+r) to this(i,j,to+r) for i=0,..., length_u()-1, and 0<=r<sdim(). When (form+r) or (to+r) reached to maximum space dimension id, next id becomes 0(form the start).

Parameters:
j id of this which indicates the placement.
bp Input vector.
to Indicates to where of this in the space dimension id.
from Indicates from where of vector in the space dimension.
void MGSPointSeq::store_BP_along_v_at ( size_t  i,
const MGBPointSeq &  bp,
size_t  to = 0,
size_t  from = 0 
)

Store BPointSeq along v at u's id i.

That is, data bp(j,from+r) to this(i,j,to+r) for j=0,..., length_v()-1, and 0<=r<sdim(). When (form+r) or (to+r) reached to maximum space dimension id, next id becomes 0(form the start). Indicates from where of vector in the space dimension.

Parameters:
i id of this which indicates the placement.
bp Input vector.
to Indicates to where of this in the space dimension id.
